text: Diego Orlando Benaglio (born 8 September 1983) is a former Swiss football player. He played as a goalkeeper. He played for Stuttgart, Nacional, Wolfsburg, Monaco, and the Switzerland national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League
